title: About this blog
body:
Hello,

My name is Quentin Chenevier. I live in [Toulouse, France](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Toulouse). If you are interested in better knowing me, here are 3 things you might want to know about me:

* I like **Machines**
* I like **Humans**
* I like to **discuss** about it

## Machines

I've studied many different machines and I'm really happy to study complex systems built by Humans.

I graduated in 2010 from the [Ecole Polytechnique](https://www.polytechnique.edu/en), which is a great place to learn science & technology.

From there, I had the opportunity to work on **amazingly complex** machines which fly in all kind of environments:

* In space, like [spectrometers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infrared_atmospheric_sounding_interferometer)
* In the sky, like [cockpits](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cockpit)
* In the cloud, like [data science apps](http://www.airbus.com/newsroom/press-releases/en/2017/06/airbus-launches-new-open-aviation-data-platform--skywise--to-sup.html)

All those machines have one thing in common: they **process huge amounts of Information**. 

## Humans

I've discovered meditation in 2016 and it's helping me to understand my own thinking processes and having empathy for others. As a result, I started to read a lot about psychology, sociology and cognitive sciences. Since then, the beauty of the Human's mind and the complexity of its inner workings has never stopped to amaze me.

I graduated an MBA in 2018 from the [Toulouse Business School](http://www.tbs-education.fr/en), which is a great place to learn business & management.

From there, I began to be passionate about how organizations work. After all, they are complex systems made of Humans & Machines made by Humans.

## I like to discuss

I would by happy to discuss with you, feel free to contact me:
